body.name: Aheaplus Rotating Bookshelf, Corner Bookshelf, 360 Display Wood Spinning Bookshelf, Floor Standing Bookcase Narrow Shelf Revolving Organizer Storage Rack for Small Space, Bedroom, Study Room, Grey Oak

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Stable and Smooth 360° Rotating Bookshelf】 Our Bookshelf can rotate 360 degrees freely. With a gentle spin, easily get the book you need and no mess anymore. Open shelves are great for displaying all your books and displays. Thickened wooden boards provide great stability and durability. Each layer is separated by steel bars, making it easy to classify and prevent books from tipping over.

【Corner Bookshelf with Spacious Storage】 Sturdy 4-tier shelf and an open top shelf provide enough space for display and storage. Each tier is divided into 4 small cubbies, providing ample space for placing and organizing your books, plants, collections and knick-knacks.Compared to the round bookshelf, our square bookshelf has a larger capacity and suit for all sized books. Safe and stable, books will not fall off. Perfect for accessorizing, organizing, and storing and keeping tidy.

【Save Space & Decor Room】This narrow bookshelf maximizes the utilization of narrow space. Ideal for corners and small spaces. Compared to traditional bookshelves, our bookcases occupy less space and have a larger capacity. Ideal for almost any space in your home. While saving space, is also a work of art, suitable as a gift for family or friends. Overall dimension: 15.75"D x 15.75"W x 54''H, Each layer height: 11.6 inch

【High-Quality Selected Materials & Multiple Usage 】Crafted of Wood Board and rigid metal frame, provides excellent stability and durability. With an attractive Spinning appearance and functional design, the perfect platform for displaying your decorations. This storage shelf can be used as a bookcase, storage shelves, Display shelves, and storage organize. Suit for your living room, bedroom, balcony, office, corridor or any other space

【Worry-free Assembly & Excellent After-sales Services】 All necessary hardware & tools included and all labeled parts, easy to assemble in 30 mins. And professional customer service will always be there no matter before or after-sales. Any quality problems, just contact us, and our experienced customer service team will respond in 24 hours ASAP. Enjoy a great shopping

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Aheaplus Sturdy 360° Rotating Bookcase, great ideal for storing and showcasing books, favorite collections, potted plants, and more

Features: 1.360 Rotation. The 4-tier tree bookshelf is fitted with a ball bearing for 360 swift rotation, allowing you to conveniently get the books you are looking for. 2. Stable Construction. Thickened wooden boards and Metal Frames provide great stability and durability. 3. A clear division. Each layer is separated by steel bars, making it easy to classify and prevent books from tipping over. 4. Spacious Storage. A sturdy 4-tier shelf and an open top shelf provide enough space for display and storage. Large capacity can hold up to 300 books.

Specification: Color: Black, White, Pink, Black Oak and Rustic Brown to choose Dimension: 15.75"D x 15.75"W x 54''H, Material: E1 MDF board and thick steel frame Package includes: 1 x Rotating Bookshelf 1 x Assemble Kit, 1 x Instruction Warm Tips: 1. Put the screws in loosely until all pieces are together and then tighten them all. It will save your time if you make a mistake when installing. 2. We suggest it is faster and easier to install with an electric drill. 2 People are recommended when you install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a bookcase that wouldnt take up so much room like a conventional bookcase and when I saw this rotating one, I just had to try it. It was very easy to build by one person. Seems sturdy. And looks great! No issues assembling with mismatched holes or anything and the turning component works as it should. Definitely worth the money! I will be getting another one as it didnt fit all my books. I would say depending on size it will fit about 200. Also the shelf parts are pretty narrow in length so if you have a longer book besides a normal hardback/paperback, it will stick out awkwardly. Its about 5 feet tall as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This bookshelf is stylish and holds many books.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my granddaughters’ bedroom. Their smaller bookshelf no longer held all the books. My daughter reports it was pretty easy to put together and looks great in the room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect space saver
reviews.reviewText: Holds quite a few books and all sizes. Set up can be tricky but worthwhile. Perfect space saver!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Product, Easy Assembly
reviews.reviewText: I have a pretty small space, so this is a perfect fit. The materials are quality wood and metal and even with it loaded with books (to it's limit, not over it), it spins well and easily. I put it together by myself in less than 30 minutes. It is easy to move when empty. I recommend assembling it close to where you want it to "live" because it is very heavy once it is loaded with books. Great piece, great price, very glad I bought it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice book shelf
reviews.reviewText: This is a very sturdy book shelf with a large capacity and convenient design. The directions were very clear and easy to follow. I’m a 69 year old female and I could assemble this by myself until it was almost complete, then I needed help only because it is so heavy. Very nice piece exactly as described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the roomiest
reviews.reviewText: Its compact. Holds a good amount of books, but only holds may 100-150 rather than the up to 300 advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The product came very well packaged. I carefully examined the shelves while unpacking and there weren’t any scratches or scuffs on the wood. Assembly was pretty straight forward but do pay attention to where the orientation of the tiny holes on the metal sides and make sure not to over tighten the screws so you don’t break through the planks. I only used the provided Allen key and it wasn’t really that difficult. Seems to hold a decent amount, I haven’t filled it up yet so I can’t say how the turning function would be affected by weight of the books once it’s filled. All in all, I am very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect. Per my husband, sturdy. All parts were there. All holes matched perfectly. No issues. Will be perfect for my cookbooks!
